attributes.additional_details: There is more houses being built in our village/small town. Our surgery cant cope with the amount of residents as it is so how they'll cope with another 500+ households I'll never know
attributes.background: Our no longer small village is getting bigger and bigger with more houses being built quickly.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  

You might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548999
